pageContent: Purpose: The purpose of this study was to investigate the potential of MR-guided pulsed focused ultrasound (pFUS) for the enhancement of drug uptake in prostate tumors in vivo using doxorubicin (Dox).

metaData.source:
Results and side effects of high-intensity focused ultrasound in localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11394458/
